subject: College Athletics
Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: One day after making a 37-foot buzzer-beater, Evan Turner bailed out Ohio State again, scoring 12 of his 31 points after regulation in a double-overtime victory over Illinois.
snippet: One day after making a 37-foot buzzer-beater, Evan Turner bailed out Ohio State again, scoring 12 of his 31 points after regulation in a double-overtime victory over Illinois.
